chart_description: This chart shows the number of unique users who have interacted with the RPC (Remote Procedure Call) layer within the last 2 minutes on the exchange. This can be useful for monitoring the usage and load on the RPC layer, which is responsible for allowing clients to communicate with the exchange server.

dimension_descriptions.active: This dimension tracks whether the user has actively interacted with the RPC layer within the last 2 minutes. If the user has, they are counted as active, otherwise they are not.
